app-is-offline: SongiApp is prepared for offline usage, you can install it as normal app
could-add-songpro: You could also add songs in songpro format. Songpro is text file format allowing to store songs with chords and other metadata.
delete-all-data.question: Really delete all downloaded songs?
no-active-songs: You have no active songs in your database. Please download some songs in "Databases" section. Only songs from checked databases are active.
question: Question
really-delete-database.question: Really delete database {db}?
show-all-artists.detail: Don't show alphabet on Artists page. Can be much slower.
song-added-to-db: Song was added to local database
specify-search-criteria: Please specify some search criteria. Each searched word must contain at least two letters, single letters and numbers are ignored.
succesfully-saved-db: Saved database, detected {songs} songs and {artists} artists
